Le constat est qu’il y a une accumulatio: The observation is that there is an accumulation of evils and a considerable loss of human, ancestral and Christian values ​​of equity, justice, honesty, loyalty, modesty, giving way to anti-values ​​of corruption, incivility, sexual deviance, impunity, etc.
Nous nous attendons à ce que par nos act: We expect that through our activities the consumption basket of the average Congolese will increase day by day to an acceptable level.
Toutes nos batteries en marche pour cont: All our batteries in motion to contribute to the emergence of our dear and beautiful country the DRC through our lines of activity which promote the empowerment and integration of Congolese.
Nous nous préoccupons de l’amélioration: We are concerned with improving the quality of life of the average Congolese through our activities. We are committed to making it a reality.
Pour l'amélioration de la qualité de vie: To improve the quality of life of the Congolese, the KAMBA Foundation offers these areas of activity to make real changes in people's lives.
Le premier objectif vise à améliorer la: The first objective is to improve productivity and increase production. This implies a better use of resources and a diversification of production without heavy investments.
Un ensemble d'activités qui consiste à a: A set of activities which consists in freeing the woman from the bonds, the obstacles, the state of dependence, domination as well as prejudices in order to create a woman of self-esteem and autonomy.
Encourager l'apprentissage de la lecture: Encourage learning to read. By teaching the basics of reading and writing, this method also includes social and cultural learning.
Lutter contre le désœuvrement et anti va: Fight against idleness and anti-values ​​of youth
La lutte contre le désœuvrement et la dé: The fight against the idleness and delinquency of young people is the permanent theme of a real base of objectives of the Kamba association.
Déterminé à jouer un rôle de premier pla: Determined to play a leading role and to put our intelligence at the service of the Congolese nation in order to promote its development.
Notre objet social est celui d'améliorer: Our social purpose is to improve the living conditions of the Congolese by organizing activities aimed at making them autonomous and responsible for the emergence of our very dear country the DRC on the social, economic, health, cultural and other levels.
Elébore et exécuter des Project de dével: Develops and executes development projects in several areas of education, agriculture, health and social;
La lutte contre l’insécurité alimentaire: The fight against food insecurity by promoting agriculture;
Créer des supers marchés à grand échelle: Create large-scale super markets to international standards throughout the DRC;
Combattre l’analphabétisation et tous le: Combat illiteracy and all other educational deficits;
La lutte contre le désœuvrement et les a: The fight against idleness and flagrant anti-values ​​among the youth and to develop it by all legal means of development;
Congolais, nous considerons l'impact de: Congolese, we consider the impact of our actions in the development process of our country.
Nous sommes convaincus que, seules des a: We are convinced that only effective and dynamic actions carried out with a spirit of serenity can contribute substantially to improving the living conditions of the population. Reaffirming our commitment to organize ourselves in order to support the various efforts and strategies put in place on behalf of the improvement of the social situation of the Congolese.
Retrouvez tous les moyens de rentrer en: Find all the ways to get in touch with the KAMBA Foundation on this page. We are and will remain open to all requests.
